/home/joan/software/clion-2018.3.2/bin/cmake/linux/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/clang-6.0 -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/clang++-6.0 -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /home/joan/luoxiong/C++/Code/c++_standard_lib
